title: travelplanner: I need to organize a 3-day trip for a group of 3, departing from Asheville and arriving in Minneapolis. We will be traveling from March 7th to March 9th, 2022, with a total budget of $2,300. We require accommodations that allow pets and provide entire rooms. Regarding meals, our group enjoys a variety of cuisines, including Indian, Chinese, Mediterranean, and American. (4784408387cfb248)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

chat_history.content: Find a flight from Asheville to Minneapolis for 3 people, departing on March 7th, 2022.
There is no flight from Asheville to Minneapolis on 2022-03-07.
chat_history.name: flight_search

chat_history.content: It appears there are no available flights from Asheville to Minneapolis on March 7th, 2022. Would you like to try a different date or need assistance with anything else?

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular attractions in Minneapolis that you can visit from March 7th to March 9th, 2022:

1. **Minneapolis Sculpture Garden**
   - **Address:** 725 Vineland Pl, Minneapolis, MN 55403, USA
   - **Phone:** (612) 375-7600
   - **Website:** [Minneapolis Sculpture Garden](https://www.walkerart.org/garden/)

2. **Minneapolis Institute of Art**
   - **Address:** 2400 3rd Ave S, Minneapolis, MN 55404, USA
   - **Phone:** (888) 642-2787
   - **Website:** [Minneapolis Institute of Art](https://new.artsmia.org/)

3. **Mill City Museum**
   - **Address:** 704 S 2nd St, Minneapolis, MN 55401, USA
   - **Phone:** (612) 341-7555
   - **Website:** [Mill City Museum](https://www.mnhs.org/millcity)

4. **Mill Ruins Park**
   - **Address:** 102 Portland Ave S, Minneapolis, MN 55401, USA
   - **Phone:** (612) 313-7793
   - **Website:** [Mill Ruins Park](https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/mill_ruins_park/)

5. **Weisman Art Museum**
   - **Address:** 333 E River Pkwy, Minneapolis, MN 55455, USA
   - **Phone:** (612) 625-9494
   - **Website:** [Weisman Art Museum](https://wam.umn.edu/)

6. **Gold Medal Park**
   - **Address:** Second Street and 11th Avenue South, Minneapolis, MN 55415, USA
   - **Phone:** (612) 904-5607
   - **Website:** [Gold Medal Park](http://www.goldmedalpark.org/)

7. **Foshay Museum and Observation Deck**
   - **Address:** 821 S Marquette Ave 30th floor, Minneapolis, MN 55402, USA
   - **Phone:** (612) 215-3700
   - **Website:** [Foshay Museum and Observation Deck](http://wminneapolis.com/)

8. **Minnehaha Falls**
   - **Address:** 4801 S Minnehaha Dr, Minneapolis, MN 55417, USA
   - **Phone:** (612) 230-6400
   - **Website:** [Minnehaha Falls](https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/minnehaha_regional_park/)

9. **Prospect Park Water Tower**
   - **Address:** 55 Malcolm Ave SE, Minneapolis, MN 55414, USA
   - **Phone:** (612) 767-6531
   - **Website:** [Prospect Park Water Tower](https://www.prospectparkmpls.org/)

10. **St. Anthony Falls Visitor Center**
    - **Address:** 1 Portland Ave, Minneapolis, MN 55401, USA
    - **Phone:** (651) 293-0200
    - **Website:** [St. Anthony Falls Visitor Center](https://www.nps.gov/miss/planyourvisit/stanfall.htm)

11. **Mall of America®**
    - **Address:** 60 E Broadway, Bloomington, MN 55425, USA
    - **Phone:** (952) 883-8800
    - **Website:** [Mall of America](https://mallofamerica.com/)

12. **Walker Art Center**
    - **Address:** 725 Vineland Pl, Minneapolis, MN 55403, USA
    - **Phone:** (612) 375-7600
    - **Website:** [Walker Art Center](https://walkerart.org/)

13. **Central Mississippi Riverfront Regional Park**
    - **Address:** East and West banks of the Mississippi River between & 35W bridges, Ave N, Minneapolis, MN 55401, USA
    - **Website:** [Central Mississippi Riverfront Regional Park](https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/central_mississippi_riverfront_regional_park/)

14. **Minneapolis Lookout**
    - **Address:** 3045-3109 Ridgway Pkwy, Minneapolis, MN 55413, USA

15. **Water Power Park**
    - **Address:** 204 SE Main St, Minneapolis, MN 55414, USA
    - **Phone:** (612) 230-6400
    - **Website:** [Water Power Park](https://www.nps.gov/miss/planyourvisit/waterpower.htm)

16. **Minnehaha Regional Park**
    - **Address:** 4801 S Minnehaha Dr, Minneapolis, MN 55417, USA
    - **Phone:** (612) 230-6400
    - **Website:** [Minnehaha Regional Park](https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/minnehaha_regional_park/)

17. **Stepped Tower**
    - **Address:** Unnamed Road, Minneapolis, MN 55454, USA

18. **American Swedish Institute**
    - **Address:** 2600 Park Ave, Minneapolis, MN 55407, USA
    - **Phone:** (612) 871-4907
    - **Website:** [American Swedish Institute](http://www.asimn.org/)

19. **Boom Island Lighthouse**
    - **Address:** 3-29 Plymouth Ave NE, Minneapolis, MN 55413, USA
    - **Website:** [Boom Island Park](https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/boom_island_park/)

20. **Boom Island Park**
    - **Address:** 724 Sibley St NE, Minneapolis, MN 55413, USA
    - **Phone:** (612) 230-6400
    - **Website:** [Boom Island Park](https://www.minneapolisparks.org/)

Enjoy your visit to Minneapolis!
